features: 👕【15s Fast Heating】-The mini steam iron has 1000 watts power, which can heat up quickly in 15 seconds for 302℉ constant temperature ironing. The ceramic titanium non-stick soleplate of the mini iron is very durable, conducts heat quickly and evenly, ensures smooth sliding on the fabric, effectively removes wrinkles, and better protects your clothes. Much faster than traditional steam irons, getting clothes back to new in no time.

👕【Powerful Steam】-The travel steam iron has a powerful steam function, which can continuously output steam with one button opening, and the steam volume can reach 16g/min. The delicate steam has strong penetrating power, which can easily and effectively soften the fibers of clothes deeply, and remove various wrinkles and stubborn creases. The 100ml/3.4oz large water tank can hold enough water, and the steam can work continuously for about 8 minutes.

👕【Wet and Dry Ironing Mode】-This travel iron mini is very easy to use. Plug in the power plug and wait for the indicator light to turn orange to start ironing. You can click the button to turn off or turn on the steam, and switch between steam and dry ironing functions to meet your different ironing needs. In the case of steam ironing, the high heat of the titanium top can also be used for drying.

👕【Travel Steam Iron】- Compact and Lightweight, weighing only 1 pound. The foldable handle design of the portable steam iron provides convenience for your storage, 180° flexible switching for flat ironing and hanging ironing. This travel steamer iron is suitable for all kinds of fabrics, and you can take it with you on vacation or travel, and iron anytime, anywhere.

👕【Brand New Product】- All steam iron are water tested after production to ensure that the product can be used normally, so there may be a small amount of water in the water tank, please rest assured that this is a normal phenomenon, not a second-hand product. We provide a 12-month warranty on our steam iron. If there is any problem with the goods you received, please feel free to contact.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Professional Portable Steamer Iron for Clothes Rated voltage: 1000 W high power, softens fibers and removes wrinkles quickly.100 ml water tank, it is convenient to add water with the filling cup to prevent splashes.20 s to warm up, quick ironing in 3 minutes, and you can go out exquisitely in just one song time.

Ideal for Quick Touch Ups Are you searching for a little machine which can be carried worldwide and make your clothes look tid all the time? However, many irons in the market are bulky and inefficiently designed, not fit for travel in factually.Portable travel Steamer is strong enough, extremely lightweight and compact for taking along with you.Whether your definition of a polished look is a well-pressed suit, a smooth silk dress or a wrinkle-free shirt for work, you can achieve it with the Clothing Iron.

Ceramic Panel Heating This steam iron uses ceramic panel, it can be used for a long time without damaging clothes. Slides smoothly to cover the clothes, quickly removes wrinkles. Portable Design The handheld mini iron is small, lightweight, and portable, very suitable for home and travel. Pointed Curved Design Pointed curved designed steamer iron can flexibly iron narrow areas such as buttons, plackets and collars. 360 degree ironing without dead corners.

Powerful Steam Max steam up to 20g/min released fast, penetrate quickly. Come with Filling Cup 100 ml integrated water tank design, it is convenient to add water with the filling cup to prevent splashes, you can check the water level in the tank at any time. Rotated 180 Degrees Steam panel can be rotated 180 degrees for horizontal and vertical ironing, making it more convenient to iron clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptionally cute but also powerful and practical!
reviews.reviewText: This looks like an American Girl doll toy at first; it's so compact and the lavender with gold trim is just... really cute! It does not hold a lot of water, but the water cup provided helps you 1) know how much it can hold and 2) it has a pinched out pouring lip that helps get in in without a mess. It started making a nice, consistent, steam in 10 SECONDS! I compared this to my full-size Conair steamer, and it worked just as well. It doesn't last as long between refills, but hey, it's a TRAVEL steamer. There was no sputtering, and the steam was not drippy or wet. Turn off the steam, and it stays hot and is used as an iron! (You need to unplug this to fully power off.) It even has a nifty little beak at the front to get into corners and around buttons a bit, and it has a tray with silicone supports to rest it on while hot. I left it there awhile and nothing melted. I love how compact it is when folded up. I did find that the water tank plug wanted to pop out and leak if I didn't push it in place very firmly. I think this would be awesome for travel, or for a dorm for kids who don't need to iron much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a steam iron not steamer
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for upcoming travel. It arrived nicely packaged and in good condition. It was exactly the advertised weight which is noticeably heavier than my travel garment steamer, (all plastic). However, this will actually iron, not just steam, so it is more versatile for items that need a “sharp” press adding only about a half a pound more. It works just like a mini iron. I only use distilled water in it to keep it clean. Overall a nice little iron for travel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nothing ruins an outfit more than wrinkles where wrinkles do not belong. Fortunately, this steamer is small enough to tuck into a suitcase or overnight bag.The oval shaped design is small enough to easily pack and store but the iron face is big enough to handle pressing clothes fast.Steam also cleans and disinfects clothing.It comes with a cooling tray stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cannot do one blouse on one fill.
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to like this. It actually works great. But I also don’t have time to keep refilling it to do one blouse. It stated in the manual that it could do several shirts on one fill. That didn’t happen. I had to refill it 3X to finish one satin blouse. This may work for some with its compact size but I am much too busy to be constantly refilling it to just get thru one shirt.The color and the weight of this is very nice. It steam irons very well. It just did not suit my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A little weird
reviews.reviewText: The steam starts almost instantly – there’s no heat up time. It also vibrates a lot, presumably that is how it heats so quickly. It only has one temperature, which makes it not ideal for my purpose, which is sewing. The steam seems to mostly come out from the bottom of the iron. It seems like it would be a good option for bringing on travel. It starts steaming pretty quickly and will easily steam your clothes. I would not recommend using it as an iron, however.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heats up quick! Super easy travel. Able to take in the carry on bag with no problem. It works well. I balled up my clothes and ironed them fast and perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It takes 18 seconds from plug in to Steam Ready.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a compact, clean looking and solid travel iron. I like that it folds it's handle for compact storage. It feels better with the handle rotated out and away from the iron body. The little cup is marked to 80ml but the iron says it takes 100ml. Not a problem though. It heats up really fast and is ready to go in under 20 seconds. WOW. The hot iron temp is just around 320deg. and when steaming, it drops to about 240deg. The iron bottom coating appears to be like that on some frying pans and seams to be good quality. I was even impressed with the electric cord having a isolated shielded covering. I did use distilled water in it and when finished put the remaining water back in the jug for next time. My test video was on a pair of wrinkled Levis to see how tough it is. I give it 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars From Wrinkled Woes to Steamy Satisfaction
reviews.reviewText: This Enemupa portable iron isn't just a travel companion, it's a wrinkle-wrestling warrior! Forget bulky beasts that hog suitcase space, this little dynamo packs a powerful punch in a pint-sized package. Steaming shirts? Smoothing scarves? Defeating denim creases? This iron tackles them all with the ferocity of a miniature dragon (minus the fire, thankfully).Small but Mighty:Don't underestimate its size. This iron heats up like a champ, unleashing a steamy torrent that rivals its full-sized brethren. It dances across fabrics, banishing wrinkles like a magician vanishing pigeons (though hopefully your clothes stay put!).User-Friendly, with a Side of Mystery:Navigating this iron is a breeze. It's ergonomic, comfortable to hold, and glides over garments like a seasoned ice skater. Just be prepared for a mini-adventure with the instructions. Tiny font can feel like deciphering ancient hieroglyphics, but thankfully, the pictures offer helpful clues (though the "pure water" enigma remains unsolved – distilled water seems to do the trick!).Power with Precautions:This iron's heat and steam are like a superhero's powers – great for good, but handle with care! Delicate fabrics might need a superhero sidekick in the form of a protective cloth. And like any powerful tool, unattended use requires caution. Set a timer, be vigilant, and remember, great power comes with great responsibility (for your clothes, at least).From Skeptic to Steam Fan:Despite the teeny-tiny instructions and the lack of fabric-specific settings, this Enemupa iron won me over. It's compact, powerful, and gets the job done beautifully. So, if you're looking for a wrinkle-busting travel buddy or a space-saving sidekick for your home arsenal, give this little steamer a try. You might just find yourself converted, like I did, from skeptic to steam-powered enthusiast!
